name: places/ChIJP6UiLLtZwokRANWdIglJpBg
formattedAddress: 330 W 11th St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 330 W 11th St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I have attended at least 5 classes with Andrew at NYC Wine Company.  He offers a variety of classes focusing on many different regions.  You can learn about classics such as Italian, French or Californian wines or lesser well known regions such as Croatia, Hungary and Portugal.  You taste about 8 wines, which have been thoughtfully paired with Murray's cheeses and delicious breads.  Andrew is extremely knowledgeable and helps guide you through each wine's aroma and tasting notes with warmth and openness, understanding that we all have different palates that smell and taste differently.  NYC Wine Company classes are great for a date, a night out with friends or visiting family members.  Anyone from a novice to an expert will walk away with a deeper understanding and perhaps a new favorite wine.

originalText.text:
Such a informative, and high-quality wine class. My girlfriend and I took the Tuscany region wine class. Andrew, the host of the wine classes, is incredibly knowledgeable and will provide you with helpful facts, terminology, and answer any question you have regarding the experience. Also, the selection of wines, locally-bought cheeses and breads, were great and we enjoyed them throughly

The classes take place in a home which makes it feel like you’re just over for a good time with friends.

I highly suggest taking one of the wine classes with them!

Thanks again, we will be back!

originalText.text: Recently attended Wine 101(zoom) with Andrew.  It was a wonderful experience.  Andrew is filled with much enthusiasm and information regarding wine production to choosing wine from different regions.  I know what to look for to buy wine that I like. Thank you Andrew.

text.text: Recently attended Wine 101(zoom) with Andrew.  It was a wonderful experience.  Andrew is filled with much enthusiasm and information regarding wine production to choosing wine from different regions.  I know what to look for to buy wine that I like. Thank you Andrew.

originalText.text: I had a private Wine 101 class with my friends and it was the absolute best! Very charming location in the West Village and Andrew was beyond knowledgeable. It truly was a great education of wine - not to mention, the cheese served was delicious. Would 100% recommend

originalText.text: Wonderful experience!  Learned so much about Tuscan wines and cheese pairings. Spent the next week repeating the experience. We’re going to take more of Andrew’s classes. So we’ll done!  Highly recommended!  Very knowledgeable and and accessible to all questions from the group we attended with.
